import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' const StudentTable = () => { const [students,setStudents]=useState("") const DisplayDetails=(id)=>{ console.log(id) } useEffect(()=>{ fetch('http://localhost:8000/students') .then((res)=>res.json()) .then((data)=> setStudents(data)) .catch((err)=> console.log(err.message)) },[]) return (

Student Records

{item.id} {item.name} {item.place} {item.phone} Edit Delete
) } export default StudentTable
